src:
Klaim Diusir Ratu Tisha dari Ruang Kongres, 6 Calon Ketua PSSI Siap Lapor FIFA
02 Nov 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Enam Calon Ketua Umum PSSI, yakni Aven Hinelo, Yesaya Oktavianus, Fary Djemi Francis, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Benny Erwin, dan Sarman El Hakim melontarkan sebuah klaim. Menurut mereka, mereka diusir oleh Sekretaris Jenderal (Sekjen) PSSI, Ratu Tisha, dari ruangan Kongres Pemilihan PSSI di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Setelah itu, keenamnya memilih menarik diri dari Kongres Pemilihan.
Alhasil, bursa pencalonan ketua umum PSSI tinggal menyisakan tiga kandidat, yaitu Mochamad Iriawan, Arif Putra Wicaksono, dan Rahim Soekasah.
Sebelum Kongres Pemilihan digelar, dua calon ketua umum PSSI, La Nyalla Mattalitti dan Bernhard Limbong, telah lebih dulu menarik diri.
Kejadian bermula ketika keenam calon itu hendak menyampaikan aspirasi kepada FIFA dan AFC saat kongres berlangsung. Namun, keenam calon tersebut mendapat halauan dari petugas keamanan di dalam ruang kongres.
text:
Claims Expelled by Queen Tisha from the Congress Room, 6 Prospective PSSI Chairperson Ready to Report FIFA
02 Nov 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Six PSSI General Candidates, namely Aven Hinelo, Isaiah Oktavianus, Fary Djemi Francis, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Benny Erwin, and Sarman El Hakim made a claim. According to them, they were expelled by the Secretary General (Secretary General) of PSSI, Ratu Tisha, from the PSSI Election Congress room at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019).
After that, the six chose to withdraw from the Election Congress.
As a result, the nomination market for PSSI's general chairperson left only three candidates, namely Mochamad Iriawan, Arif Putra Wicaksono, and Rahim Soekasah.
Before the Election Congress was held, two PSSI general chairperson candidates, La Nyalla Mattalitti and Bernhard Limbong, had already withdrawn.
The incident began when the six candidates were about to express their aspirations to FIFA and the AFC during the congress. However, the six candidates received direction from security officers inside the congress room.
